name: SaaS Dashboard
description: Data-rich enterprise dashboard design. Optimized for analytics, metrics, and complex data visualization with clear information hierarchy.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Data-first design emphasizing clarity and scannability. Dense layouts that maximize information without overwhelming. Use cards and sections to organize complex data.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Purple-indigo primary for brand identity. Green accent for positive metrics and success states. Use semantic colors consistently: green for growth, red for decline, amber for warnings.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Prioritize data tables, charts, and metric cards. Use compact spacing for dashboard efficiency. Implement clear visual hierarchy with subtle borders and shadows. Support dark mode for extended use.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Ensure sufficient contrast for small text in dense layouts. Data visualizations must include text alternatives. Support keyboard navigation for all interactive elements.
